translation: Neither by the Vedas, nor by austerity, nor by gift, nor by sacrifice can I be seen in this form as thou hast seen Me so easily.
commentary: 11.53 Not not? I'm I? by the Vedas? Not not? Tapasa by austerity? Not not? by gift by gift? Not not? f and? Ijyaya by sacrifice? possible (am) possible? Such a thing like this? to see to be seen? have you seen (thou) hast seen? Maam Me? As as.Commentary This Cosmic Form which thou hast seen so easily cannot be obtained either by the study of the Vedas and the six modes of philosophy? nor by the practice of manifold
